biography:
Sunnyi Melles (born 7 October 1958 in Luxembourg, Luxembourg) is a Hungarian / Swiss actress active in Germany and Austria. She is the daughter of Austrian orchestral conductor Carl Melles and  Hungarian noblewoman Judith von Rohonczy (1929-2001). Since 1993 she has been married to Prince Peter zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Sayn (b. 1954).
